痬字的基本解释

痬
yì
狂疾。
传染病。

痬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》羊益切，入昔，以。］
(1)病名。惊狂之疾。
(2)疾病互相传染。

痬字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痬； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页774第27
【唐韻】羊益切【集韻】夷益切，?音繹。【說文】脈痬也。【廣韻】病相染也。【集韻】關中謂病相傳為痬。　又【博雅】痬，癡也。　又【集韻】施隻切，音釋。義同。

痬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
痬字的起名意思

暂无。

痬
Basic explanation of words
痬
yì
Crazy.
infectious disease.
痬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" Yang Yi cut, into the past, to. ]
(1) The name of the disease. Frightening disease.
(2) Diseases are transmitted to each other.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　痬; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 774 27
[Tang Yun] Sheep Yi cut 【Ji Yun】 Yi Yi cut, sound interpretation. [Said Wen] The pulse is also. [Guang Yun] The disease is also infected. [Jiyun] Guanzhong said that the disease was passed down as a 痬.　【Bo Ya】痬, idiotic.　[Jiyun] Shi Zhiqie, sound interpretation. The same meaning.
